error_gaps.description: No context managers for file operations beyond basic with statements
No support for remote JSON/schema URLs or network timeouts
No streaming or memory limits for large JSON files
No graceful fallbacks or retry logic for transient failures
No progress indication for long-running validations

recommendations: Add helpful suggestions for common JSON syntax errors
Provide file path context in all error messages
Include line/column numbers in all JSON parse errors
Show surrounding context for validation errors
Add error codes for programmatic handling
Add file size validation before processing
Implement proper resource cleanup in error scenarios

priority_recommendations.task: Enhance error messages with actionable suggestions
priority_recommendations.implementation: Add error message templates and common fix suggestions
Validate file sizes, permissions, and formats before processing
Add fallback options and recovery mechanisms
